Standard liquids can be stored by liquid tanks.

Water Tank
- Drains water buckets, water bottles
- Fills buckets, bottles
- Fills adjacent cauldrons

Lava Tank
- Drains lava buckets
- Fills buckets
- Fuels adjacent furnaces
- Drains lava cauldrons
- Fills adjacent cauldrons

Rabbit Stew Tank
- Drains rabbit stew
- Fills bowls
- Feeds players

Beetroot Soup Tank
- Drains beetroot soup, beetroot
- Fills bowls
- Feeds players

Mushroom Stew Tank
- Drains mushroom stew
- Fills bowls
- Milks mooshrooms
- Feeds players

Milk Tank
- Drains milk buckets
- Fills buckets
- Milks cows
- Clear mob effects

Honey Tanks
- Drains honey bottles, honey blocks
- Fills bottles
- Casts honey blocks into cauldrons
- Clears mob poison
- Feeds players

Experience Tanks
- Drains bottles o' enchanting, enchanted books
- Fills bottles
- Absorbs experience orbs, player experience points
- Fills player experience points
